name: Tale of Cities
description:
Welcome, Mayor! Be the hero of your very own medieval fantasy city as you design and create a beautiful city. This game is built for children and adult. Plan your city and building placements, Plan Strategically and keep building to Level Up and Earn XP. Critical and quick thinking will make you a better mayor. Build houses to increase population. Build attractions to keep your citizens happy and keep a balance. Build Iron Mine and Gold Mine to mine iron and gold. Build a Barrack to Train Troops. Build several buildings and make your way to the Castle. Every decision is yours as your city gets larger. This game offers much more than it looks. Here are some of the highlights:

• FREE TO PLAY
• City-building journey set in medieval times
• Build Roads to connect the buildings.
• Simple and Intuitive Touch Controls for easy and casual gameplay.
• Maintain the happiness of the people.
• Earn Daily rewards such as Gold for playing game daily
• Gather and Earn Resources
• Gather Wood Resources,
• Collect Gold for work,
• Make Food for people
• Make clothes and leather clothes as you advance.
• Mine Iron and Stone
• Play and challenge all the difficulty modes
• Build Schools to Gain Knowledge so you can improve your skills.
• Create Inn, Temple, City Hall and Statue to increase the happiness
• Mobile, Tablet and Android TV Support

Bring your city to life and Keep your imaginations high to build something unique and wonderful. Think and Maintain a balance between the events in the game.
Tale of Cities is FREE to Download and Play. However, you can view ads to increase your resources.
